
                            
                            <p>领的7折重货券。自己填的数据，折后200出头。京东小哥帮忙打了2个包裹，最后按体积比我预估的价格还低。打包费才收10元。 <br>  <br> 领券之后发件人电话只能填自己的，地址里写发件人电话，或者提前加快递员VX。 <br>  <br> 输上大概重量尺寸数据，顺丰重货最贵，德邦也要两百五多，抖音加的当地中铁快运VX，也报200左右。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/075731vt2tyui9i99tz99y.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/075731vt2tyui9i99tz99y.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/080327ondo5o95c3nfdfd9.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/080327ondo5o95c3nfdfd9.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/075733czljmw4ycbwc1lmi.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/075733czljmw4ycbwc1lmi.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/080435vggglzhpdsha44ip.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/080435vggglzhpdsha44ip.jpg"> <br> </p><p class="pl">用第三方平台可以5折吧</p><p></p>
